attributes.action: PM Theresa May must step down to get a No Deal
attributes.background: The PM must step down so that the country and carry out what the majority voted for to leave the EU not in name only but if need be to leave with a No Deal

rejection.details:
This would be a decision for the Prime Minister and not the UK Government or Parliament.

You might like to consider signing this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235185
